descriptions: This structure is the central regulator for the energy network. As such, make sure it is not destroyed.
This structure is the central regulator for the energy network. As such, make sure it is not destroyed.
This structure is the central regulator for the energy network. As such, make sure it is not destroyed.
This solar panel collects energy based on the time of day.
This farm collects energy based on the time of year.
This radiator collects energy based on the time of day.
This turret fires lasers at incoming enemies. It draws energy as lasers are fired.
This tower fires arrows at incoming enemies. It draws energy as arrows are fired.
This cannon fires plasma balls at incoming enemies. It draws energy as plasma is fired.
This is the most basic form of mass energy storage. This acts as a reserve energy storage location.
This is the most basic form of mass energy storage. This acts as a reserve energy storage location.
This is the most basic form of mass energy storage. This acts as a reserve energy storage location.
This rig extracts oil from below the water's surface, generating a constant amount of energy.
This wheel turns along with the movement of water, generating a constant amount of energy.
This structure extracts hydrogen from water, generating a constant amount of energy.
This tower periodically deploys landmines which hurt incoming enemies.
This tower periodically deploys bombs which hurt incoming enemies.
This tower periodically deploys proximity mines which hurt incoming enemies.
